frameworks: AWS SDK integrations for Step Functions (service integration ARNs)
dependencies: Python dev tooling (from /requirements.txt): pre-commit==3.8.0, PyYAML==6.0.2, virtualenv==20.26.3, cfgv==3.4.0, distlib==0.3.8, filelock==3.15.4, identify==2.6.0, nodeenv==1.9.1, platformdirs==4.2.2
architectural_resources: Amazon S3 bucket(s) for input (/text/), intermediate (/comprehend/), and datalake outputs (/datalake/...) (described in /README.md; referenced by Step Functions s3:getObject/s3:putObject tasks)
Amazon SQS queues (2 queues; described in /README.md)
AWS Step Functions state machines (2: S3ObjectCreatedText and S3ObjectCreatedComprehend; in /state_machine/*.json)

AWS Comprehend API calls via Step Functions service integrations (detectDominantLanguage, detectEntities, detectKeyPhrases, detectPiiEntities, detectSentiment, detectSyntax, detectTargetedSentiment, detectToxicContent) (in /state_machine/S3ObjectCreatedText.json)
Amazon EventBridge (routing S3->SQS->Step Functions; described in /README.md)
